title: More Than 250 People Killed After Separatist Attacks In Pakistan: Official
summary_full: More than 250 people have been killed in coordinated attacks launched by separatists across Pakistan's Balochistan province since Saturday, a security official said on Wednesday.
summary_public: More than 250 people have been killed in coordinated attacks launched by separatists across Pakistan's Balochistan province since Saturday, a security official said on Wednesday.
